attributes.action: Stop operation stack on th m20
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For a few years now operation stack has brought troubles to ashford and many surrounding areas in kent, Why should the people of kent suffer with the problem i understand that lorrys need somewhere to park but not hear,Proper preperation by the government should have seen these problems in advance, im sure that as many others are we want operation stack stoped on the m20.
